about_the_game:
A survival game first and foremost

The main objective in Rocket Hit is to survive, not the horrible aliens, but rather the numerous asteroids that detach from their belts to strike directly at the fuselage of your rocket, so you have to be attentive at all times, without ending up charred by a star, destroyed by an asteroid, swept into the vacuum of space by a comet or swallowed by a black hole.

A unique atmosphere

Enjoy an incomparable atmosphere in star systems each denser than the last, get up close to each planet and star and feel the immensity of the stars and space. With total immersion, relax in orbit on Rocket Hit.

A realistic physics

The physics of the game's orbits are realistic, providing a simple understanding of orbital physics, even greater immersion, exclusive and innovative gameplay, and much more.

A world on a smaller scale

You'll notice that the game's scale is far from realistic, allowing you to experience a game with such physics first-hand, but also simplifying exploration and action by giving the game a cartoonish complexion.

Complete cosmetics customization and much more

Discover a diverse range of star systems and explore them aboard mythical rockets, recreated almost identically, instantly available when you download the game.

name: Rocket Hit
short_description: Explore every star system, orbit numerous stars, maneuver to various planets, and survive asteroids the longest aboard countless miniaturized rockets in Rocket Hit.
